Title: New York's Finest
Writer: Stan Lee (based on the Marvel comics by), Bill Everett (based on the Marvel comics by), Drew Goddard (created by), Mark Verheiden, Whit Anderson (executive story editor), Luke Kalteux (executive story editor), Sneha Koorse (executive story editor)
Actors: Charlie Cox, Deborah Ann Woll, Elden Henson, Jon Bernthal
Plot: Trapped face-to-face with the Punisher, Daredevil wrestles with the morality of vigilante justice. Meanwhile, Foggy and Karen work to save the firm.
